headline: Lululemon Gets Tripped Up in Q2 by Tariffs and Product Missteps
summary: Shares of the company fell 15.3 percent and Calvin McDonald said the brand "let our product life cycles run too long" and is making course corrections for 2026.

raw.headline: Lululemon Gets Tripped Up in Q2 by Tariffs and Product Missteps
raw.summary: Shares of the company fell 15.3 percent and Calvin McDonald said the brand "let our product life cycles run too long" and is making course corrections for 2026.

headline: Lululemon Cuts Outlook as U.S. Sales Underperform
summary: The company said its updated guidance reflects lower-than-expected revenue in the second quarter, driven by the company’s U.S. business, as well as higher tariff rates.

raw.headline: Lululemon Cuts Outlook as U.S. Sales Underperform
raw.summary: The company said its updated guidance reflects lower-than-expected revenue in the second quarter, driven by the company’s U.S. business, as well as higher tariff rates.

headline: People Love McDonald’s Corporation (MCD) Because Of Value, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 10 Latest Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD)’s shares have gained 7.9% year-to-date as they have benefited from a bullish run that kicked off in late June. The shares have benefited as the firm caters to budget-conscious eaters, […]

headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Gains 350 Points; A Biotech Name Tumbles Hard (Live Coverage)
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and other major indexes continued to improve right up until the close Thursday amid surprise results in two separate jobs reports.  Meanwhile, a recent initial public offering fell hard while Broadcom made a move ahead of its earnings report on the stock market today.  Blue chips on the Dow increased their gain to 0.8%, or 350 points, despite a sell-off in Salesforce after the company reported its earnings results.

raw.headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Gains 350 Points; A Biotech Name Tumbles Hard (Live Coverage)
raw.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average and other major indexes continued to improve right up until the close Thursday amid surprise results in two separate jobs reports.  Meanwhile, a recent initial public offering fell hard while Broadcom made a move ahead of its earnings report on the stock market today.  Blue chips on the Dow increased their gain to 0.8%, or 350 points, despite a sell-off in Salesforce after the company reported its earnings results.

headline: McDonald’s splits with National Restaurant Association over tip policy
summary: CEO Chris Kempczinski said all workers should receive the same minimum wage

raw.headline: McDonald’s splits with National Restaurant Association over tip policy
raw.summary: CEO Chris Kempczinski said all workers should receive the same minimum wage

headline: McDonald’s Escalates Restaurant Industry’s Fight Over Tipping
summary: The burger giant says workers should all receive a base wage, including tipped servers employed by rivals.

raw.headline: McDonald’s Escalates Restaurant Industry’s Fight Over Tipping

headline: Can McDonald's Tech Platform Unlock a New Wave of Margin Expansion?
summary: MCD leans on edge computing and loyalty growth to unlock efficiencies and lift customer frequency.

headline: McDonald’s quits National Restaurant Association over wage dispute
summary: The association has stated that tipped workers often earn significantly more than the minimum wage.
